channel.title: Turmoilpkerz [pi] ||new hit plates||dungeoneering||drop party room|| updated ||
channel.description:
hello this is another project ive been working on with a friend :)
Red: Haven't Started Orange: Started Not Completed Green: Completed [size=10pt][b][u]Features [/u][/b][/size] Agility WoodCutting Thieving Prayer FireMaking Fletching Minining Dungeoneering Dungeoneering npc(80-90% done) Fishing Slayer Farming Summoning Cooking RuneCrafting Herblore Dungeoneering ( doors ) if i can Dungeoneering (kill count)
what the server has: new rs hit plates added Dungeoneering ( npc 80-90% done now ) lottery system new bank interface hand cannon ( working spec ) summoning ( most people have ) items on death( opens up like clue scroll ) drop party room( working drop party )
overload but when you dont have the right amount off hp for it this message comes up too stop you from dying [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture216.png[/img] overload [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture214.png[/img] [b]We fixed the new rs hit marks :) cba too delete the other pictures[/b] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture209.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture208.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture202.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture203.png[/img] [img]http://i1136.photobucket.com/albums/n490/guner123/ScreenshotStudiocapture201.png[/img] [img]http://i1192.photobucket.com/albums/aa329/stnbarton1/3-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1192.photobucket.com/albums/aa329/stnbarton1/4-1.png[/img]
Thanks for reading my thread if you wanna play pm me ill send you the webclient link in a pm
apply server coder is taken but if i think you are good ill let you in;) Name: Age: Why do you want this job: How much time will you be working: proof of work: Will you follow the rules: Any Experience: How well can you code java: MSN: Skype:

also i wanna join this project,think i can help
Name:Lukas
Age:15
Why do you want this job:im a helpfull person,i already helped this server abit.
How much time will you be working:2-4 hours depending on days
proof of work:You’ve seen it liam
Will you follow the rules:Hellz yeah…
Any Experience:2-3 yrs of photoshop
MSN:u have it
Skype:dont use it but, lukasnxd

if you want layer proof for this pm me

Off-topic:Look at the banner,some kid is saying idiot cuz i started hitting him when he wanted to loot
[/quote]

Additional information:
I’ve been looking for a project to get into and this looks promising, I hope to help this server prevail and succeed over the other regular servers, usually maintained by children -.- I enjoy a mature & creative group of developers to work with:P I’m also extremely easy to get along with, I take constructive criticism very well.[/quote]
